title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Bighorn Canyon Visitor Center NPS  Cal S. Taggart Bighorn Canyon Visitor Center Lovell, Wyoming   Winter Hours: After September 7, open 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM The visitor center is closed on the following federal holidays: Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Years Day.  The visitor center has four movies that are played on request:    The Land of the Bighorn The Geology of Bighorn Canyon Medicine Wheel   There are picnic tables in front of the visitor center, and several exhibits inside the visitor center including historic ranches exhibit.  Call: 307-548-5406        Yellowtail Dam NPS  Yellowtail Dam Visitor Center Fort Smith, Montana  Open every day 8:30 AM to 5 PM  Memorial Day through Labor Day. Closed for season.  The movie Land of the Bighorn is shown upon request.  Exhibits, bookstore and restrooms available inside visitor center.  Call: 406-666-9961        Crooked Creek Ranger Station NPS  Crooked Creek Contact Station (Near Horseshoe Bend turnoff, South District)  Hours may vary depending upon staffing. Call: 307-548-7326        Afterbay Contact Station NPS  Afterbay Contact Station (Fort Smith Montana, North District) Open intermittently. After September 7, 2015, the contact station will be open 9 AM-5 PM as staffing allows. The movie Land of the Bighorn can be played on request.  Call: 406-666-2351
